<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/stablefunction">StableFunction</a></>}>
A stable function is a function with a stable hash while tracking the locations of ignored operands and their hashes. <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/stablefunction/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>
